title: Kiss Me
description: I think I hate him. But I know I want him to kiss me.I need answers about my past and my magic. But more than anything, I need answers about Drakon, the first and most powerful vampire. He’s my fated mate, and I want to kiss him as much as I want to kill him.He feels the same about me. To complicate the insane attraction between us, the only way for him to survive is if he drinks my blood every day for the rest of our lives.He refuses to do so, and I don’t know if I can handle that kind of commitment. But can I live a life without him? As my mortal enemies stalk me in the waking world and the dream world, Drakon and I set off to unravel the mystery of our past. Danger stalks us at every turn, and its going to take everything we have to survive.Kiss Me is the final book in the Vampire Bride trilogy. If you like kickbutt heroines, powerful heroes, humor, and enemies-to-lovers, then this is the series for you.
author: Linsey Hall
